meanings.sent1: The cozy cabin was windowed, allowing sunlight to fill the rooms.
meanings.sent2: The new house was beautifully windowed, with large glass panels in every room.
meanings.sent3: The windowed bakery displayed its delicious treats for all to see.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes, like windowed mirrors, reflected the beauty of the world around her.
meanings.sent5: The windowed view of the mountains was breathtaking, framed by the wooden cabin walls.

meanings.sent1: The architect windowed the building to maximize natural light.
meanings.sent2: She windowed the attic to create a bright and airy workspace.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat windowed the entire house with its playful paws.
meanings.sent4: His smile windowed his face, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist windowed the gallery, showcasing her colorful paintings to passersby.

meanings.definition: To display in a window or windows
meanings.sent1: The shop windowed the latest fashion trends to attract customers.
meanings.sent2: She windowed her handmade jewelry in the storefront for everyone to admire.
meanings.sent3: The chef windowed the mouthwatering desserts, tempting all who passed by.
meanings.sent4: The museum windowed the ancient artifacts, drawing in history enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The florist windowed the vibrant bouquets, adding a pop of color to the street.
